title.rendered: Park and Ride to Gatwick Airport

content.rendered:
In addition to our ever popular Meet & Greet service at Gatwick, we will be looking to offer a park and ride service from our Southways car park in London Road Crawley.  The car park is situated just 5 minutes from Gatwick Airport, and we know that this service is ideal for customers travelling from the South. Just pull up at out car park which is situated on the North bound carriage way of the A23 and get our transfer bus to Gatwick North or South Terminal. *Transfers will run frequently ** Subject to availability.

On return just call us and we will meet you at the terminal and bring you back to your car.  You can expect:

  • Free Wi-fi on our transfer buses
  • Less fuel / mileage on your vehicle compared to parking on airport (if travelling to Gatwick from the South)
  • Valeting service available
  • Luggage loaded / offloaded for you at our car park and at the airport
  • Ideal for customers who are unfamiliar with Gatwick Airport

*Transfers run frequently ** Subject to availability

Look out for this product coming soon.
